Comment: Casual reminder that in the build-up to hosting the world cup in 2022, [at least 6500 migrant workers associated with the construction died](https://www.theguardian.com/global-development/2021/feb/23/revealed-migrant-worker-deaths-qatar-fifa-world-cup-2022), a number which is considered conservative because of the limited number of countries that had data available and that the months leading up to the world cup were not counted in that number.
